
                 .oooooo.                                                             .                      
                d8P'  `Y8b                                                          .o8                      
   oooo  oooo  888           .ooooo.  ooo. .oo.   ooo. .oo.    .ooooo.   .ooooo.  .o888oo  .ooooo.  oooo d8b 
   `888  `888  888          d88' `88b `888P"Y88b  `888P"Y88b  d88' `88b d88' `"Y8   888   d88' `88b `888""8P 
    888   888  888          888   888  888   888   888   888  888ooo888 888         888   888   888  888     
    888   888  `88b    ooo  888   888  888   888   888   888  888    .o 888   .o8   888 . 888   888  888     
    `V88V"V8P'  `Y8bood8P'  `Y8bod8P' o888o o888o o888o o888o `Y8bod8P' `Y8bod8P'   "888" `Y8bod8P' d888b    
                                                                                                              
============================================================
How to setup uConnector

1. Create your operation(s).

2. Create a configuration file(s) for your operation(s), you can use the 'Example.config.disabled' located in the Tasks folder as inspiration.

3. Press F5 to run uConnector Express.

============================================================
For more information how to use and extend uConnector see the sample project at https://bitbucket.org/uCommerce/uconnector-samples

============================================================
